I purchased the Lightweight Workout Joggers for my daughter as part of her cheer uniform to wear when the team isn’t performing. These joggers have been a fantastic addition to her wardrobe! The fit was exactly as expected, ensuring comfort and ease of movement, which is crucial for an active cheerleader.  The joggers look tremendous and wear wonderfully, maintaining their quality even after multiple uses. The material is lightweight yet durable, offering breathability without compromising on sturdiness. My daughter loves how stylish they are. They seamlessly blend into her cheer attire while providing a practical option for non-performance times.  Overall, these joggers have exceeded our expectations in both function and style. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for comfortable, well-fitting workout pants suitable for various activities.

I wanted to gatekeep these so they wouldn’t run out, but I LOVE these athletic joggers!!! I am a physical therapist and these are easy to move in, while still looking professional. 评论详情: Recommended size was Medium, but I knew from past purchases of this brand, I needed a Large. If you like a form fitting, tight fit, follow the chart. If you prefer a looser more comfy fit, size up from what it recommends. I’m 155lbs, 5ft 7in tall. Size 8/10 in jeans. Medium in tops. 36” bust. I love these pants. Where I work, I cannot wear shorts and there’s no A/C so I needed something lightweight and these work perfectly! Very breathable. I bought several colors. Don’t hesitate. You’ll like them.
